content: What's the solution when you need to sync config to populate the live directory (as it's currently empty), but you can't do it via the UI due to an error (Exception: The configuration directory in settings.php is specified as '../config/dev-active', but this directory is either empty or missing crucial files.) and you don't have Drush installed?

It seems Drush just deletes everything in the active directory, and then copies everything over from the staging directory: https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/backdrop-drush-extension/blob/1.x-1.x/commands/config/backdrop_config_import.drush.inc#L65 So I'll just do that I guess...
